autobuild:
<command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/ace/config.h output='#define ACE_USES_STD_NAMESPACE_FOR_STDCPP_LIB 1
#define ACE_HAS_REACTOR_NOTIFICATION_QUEUE 1
#define ACE_HAS_MINIMUM_IOSTREAMH_INCLUSION 1
#define ACE_USES_IPV4_IPV6_MIGRATION
#include \x22ace/config-linux.h\x22
'" /> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/include/makeinclude/platform_macros.GNU output='ssl=1
exceptions=1
optimize=0
debug=0
include $(ACE_ROOT)/include/makeinclude/platform_linux.GNU
CCFLAGS += -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-align
CPPFLAGS += -DACE_USE_RCSID=0

xerces3=1
dds4ccm_ndds=1
ndds=1
'" /> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/bin/MakeProjectCreator/config/default.features output='ndds=1
ssl=1
ipv6=1
zlib=1
zzip=1
xerces3=1
dds4ccm_ndds=1
'" />
